name: Tales of the Guardian Cat
description:
How to Play

Avoid and shoot the enemies, they drop xp that you can  use to level up and choose upgrades. Get all the upgrades possible to win the game!

Controls
  • WASD: move
  • Left Mouse Button: shoot
  • Right Mouse Button: choose skill upgrade
  • ESC: pause
This is a MultiJam Project, it was submitted to the VimJam 3 and the Cozy Auttumn game jam VimJam:
  • MULTIUSE: Your gun shoots and also can be used for movement. If you shoot while in the air, the cat player performs an extra jump in the opposite direction.
  • TURN UP THE HEAT: As time passes, the're will be more and more enemies for you to shoot, and you get stronger and stronger!
Cozy Auttumn:
  •  What makes Autumn cozy for us: Firstly CATS, cats make every season cozy for us, and what makes auttumn especially cozy for us is the Halloween Season, which is represented by the monsters like bats and ghosts
  • Auttumn Glow Pallete: has been used
  • One room only: Well, there's only one room
